featured.text: They travel entirely along tree branches and as a group when “commuting” between two vines, laying down trails of pheromone (a locations, such as from their nesting site to their chemical substance) behind them so that other feeding ground.

definition.zh_def: 信息素：生物體釋放的化學物質，用於與同種生物進行溝通或影響行為。
definition.en_def: A chemical substance released by an organism that influences the behavior or physiology of others of the same species.
definition.example: The ants followed the pheromone trail to find their way back to the nest.
